mainText:
I never knew Steve personally, but I always admired his hard work and
dedication to bring back a near (bankrupt) company into a multi-billion
dollar organization. He changed the way the music industry works, and
introduced the world with iPods which made our music life a lot easier.
Steve was a genius and a dedicated man, and its sad to see him go. Steve was
a one of a kind man, and its hard to see him go. My condolences to Steve,
and his family, and hope this email helps.
author: Alec
